text: The 2014 Durand Cup Final was a football match on 8 November 2014 at Raia Sports Complex, Raia, Goa. It was the final match of the 2014 Durand Cup, the 127th season of the Durand Cup, a football competition for Indian football system. Salgaocar F.C. won the cup by defeating Pune F.C. 1–0. ==Route to the final== ===Salgaocar=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;margin-left:1em;float:right" ! scope="col" style="width:25px;"| Round ! scope="col" style="width:100px;"| Opponents ! scope="col" style="width:100px;"| Score |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|QF | Indian Navy | 4 – 1 |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|QF | Laxmi Prasad | 1 – 1 |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|SF | Bengaluru FC | 0 – 0 (5 – 4) |} Salgaocar begin their campaign with 4–1 win against Indian Navy FC in the quarter finals. In the second game, they could manage only a 1–1 draw against Laxmi Prasad S.C., but it was good enough to place them in the semi- finals against I-League champions, Bengaluru FC. In the semi-finals, after the goalless regulation time and extra time Salgaocar managed to score all the penalties while Bengaluru missed one and Salgaocar entered the finals. ===Pune=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;margin-left:1em;float:right" ! scope="col" style="width:25px;"| Round ! scope="col" style="width:100px;"| Opponents ! scope="col" style="width:100px;"| Score |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|QF | | 3 – 0 |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|QF | Vasco | 1 – 0 |- !scope=row style="text-align:center"|SF | Sporting Goa | 2 – 1 |} Pune won their group by winning both the games, the first against Churchill Brothers 3-0 and the second 1–0 against Vasco. In the semi-finals, they faced Group B winner Sporting Clube de Goa. In the semi-finals, Pune won 2–1 and entered the finals. ==References== 1 Category:Durand Cup finals
title: 2014 Durand Cup Final
